attributes.action: Support the struggle of of our Brave City Boys - Britains Battling Bankers in their fight for British interests!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Brave men and women of the city, the British High Street banks and other financial institutions deserve our moral and practical support at this time.  In particular a fighting fund has been established to make sure they do not suffer.  Like 'the few; in world war two they have gone 'over the top' to fight for more and more loans for us all.  

Come on Britain - Lets Back Our Great Bankers!!

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
